name: Kumail Alkhalaf
skills_sentences: analytical and problem solving skills in cybersecurity
collaboration with IT and development teams for secure system design
distributed denial of service threat monitoring
identity and access management including multi-factor authentication
intrusion detection and prevention systems management
phishing simulation and security awareness training
security compliance with HIPAA and GDPR
security rule fine-tuning and use case development
responsibility_sentences: design and implement security protocols, standards, and best practices
conduct security assessments, vulnerability scans, and penetration tests
monitor security alerts and logs to detect suspicious activities
conduct digital forensics to analyze security incidents
train staff on security policies, best practices, and conduct phishing simulations
analyze threat advisories and generate security reports for management
collaborate with incident response team to contain and remediate security breaches
configure, manage, and maintain firewalls, intrusion detection and prevention systems, anti-virus, and endpoint protection
ensure compliance with industry standards and regulatory requirements such as HIPAA and GDPR

monitor security technologies including network detection and response, anti-distributed denial of service, data loss prevention, security information and event management, endpoint detection and response, intrusion prevention systems, web application firewall, and email gateway solutions
